title: Council Regulation (EEC) No 2189/89 of 18 July 1989 amending Annex I to Regulation (EEC) No 288/82 on common rules for imports
header:
COUNCIL  REGULATION (EEC) No 2189/89
of 18 July 1989
amending Annex I to Regulation (EEC) No 288/82 on common rules for imports
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. The quantitative restrictions applied by some Member States to certain products originating in third countries as set out in the Annex shall be abolished as from 1 July 1989.
2. The products to which the quantitative restrictions referred to in paragraph 1 apply shall be deleted from Annex I to Regulation (EEC) No 288/82.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 July 1989.
For the Council
The President
R. DUMAS
(1) OJ No L 35, 9. 2. 1982, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 370, 30. 12. 1986, p. 29.
ANNEX
